data.text: Solde Montréal! Réservez votre voyage maintenant pour économiser 50 % sur le tarif de base de tous les vols Montréal. Aucune période d'interdiction. Voyagez avant le 26 mars 2022. https://t.co/iEtTzo8JhZ https://t.co/UEgl2TTAnA
@ctrs_ No test required.
Nous célébrons Montréal avec une solde de tarifs! 50 % de réduction sur tous les tarifs de base. Tous les vols #YUL. Aucune période d'interdiction. https://t.co/iEtTzo8JhZ https://t.co/fSYrW8WulV
Celebrating Montreal with a fare sale! 50%-off all base fares. All #YUL flights. No blackouts.  https://t.co/E3KbCU3aA2 https://t.co/fyWX5jr3UY
💚💚💚 https://t.co/E9lD4bLVjh
Montreal Sale! Get 50%-off base fares on all #YUL flights! https://t.co/E3KbCU3aA2 https://t.co/1RXkzNjCOO
Solde Montréal ! Obtenez 50 % de réduction sur les tarifs de base de tous les vols #YUL ! https://t.co/iEtTzo8JhZ https://t.co/LgQs9DIi5H
@SugarmanSharna We’ve shared your comments with our respective teams and will be addressed. F&B is paused on all our flights as a safety measure and we hope to have that restored soon.
@tomy_tee Consider springing for a seat with extra legroom. However, we can’t do anything about the tiny toilets.
@SugarmanSharna We will follow up with our airports team. Which flight were you on? 🙏

@arorayogi Then your message is in the queue for the customer service team and they will get to it. They are experiencing a high volume of communications and it is taking them time to get to everyone.

Avec 20 destinations canadiennes et de nouveaux avions qui rejoignent notre flotte, nous avons encore de grands projets à venir. Abonnez-vous à notre lettre d'information électronique pour ne jamais manquer une grande annonce ou un rabais! https://t.co/UxrjJ9ZTxH

With 20 Canadian destinations and more new planes joining our fleet, we have MORE big plans ahead. Subscribe to our e-newsletter so you never miss a big announcement or a sale!  https://t.co/UxrjJ9ZTxH
@dylangalloway_ Good Morning,  our support team are working as quickly as they can, your email is in a queue.  Thank you for your understanding.
@Jedy231 If you have  not done so already please email suppport@flyflair.com with all your information.  They are extremely busy but are working as fast as they can to get back to all customers.
@kkraemerk Send an email or DM with your booking number and details. Those all feed into the system and cust service team will be in touch. They are quite busy and it will take time

@ksamgnet The customer service team is experiencing a larger than normal volume of communications. You can DM, SMS or email them and you will be in the queue and they will get back to you. Include your booking number and details. support@flyflair.com
💚 https://t.co/ETAQ7IWCJ0

@LoreneHat @DominiqueOzelie Our customer service phone lines have limited hours, yet the team works online outside of those hours 7 days/week. Our phone, email and DMs feed into the system and it takes the team time.
@DominiqueOzelie Yup. This is what we do and what drives our team.

@NairobiHastam Sorry you feel that way. You can email or send a DM with your booking number and details and it will go to the customer service team. They currently have a high volume of communications but will get to you. It just takes them time.

@btidd On the review booking/payment page, you can expand the items under price summary so see the breakdown. Also, if booking multiple people, the lower fare may only be available on a smaller number of seats.
